'''How Do You Write the Excavation Report?''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to enter the ruins to the southwest of [[The Dune of Magma]], solve the puzzles, and open the exit door at the ruins to the north. <!--To complete this achievement, the player needs to -->
